content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
your tent really knows how to live the good life, baa~

content: Fun tea deserves fun stories to go with it, baa~!
info: 闲聊-NPC对附近建筑的反馈-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
Every piece in the Omni-Gallery seems to have its own story to tell,
If there was a title for "Master Storyteller of the Omni-Gallery,"
Which piece would you give it to, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>?
info: 闲聊-NPC对附近建筑的反馈-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
Seeing Mr. Mobai always standing guard at the Camp plaza,
ready to welcome new friends,
makes me want to give him a book to read, baa-daa~
info: 闲聊-NPC对附近建筑的反馈-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
When it's running, it's your "travel buddy," baa-daa~
And when it stops to rest, it becomes your "home,"
Isn't that both poetry and adventure rolled into one? Baa~
info: 闲聊-NPC对附近建筑的反馈-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
When you were living in a tent, baa~
I was always worried you might move away someday...
Having a proper house gives you that cozy feeling of being settled in, don't you think~?
info: 闲聊-NPC对附近建筑的反馈-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
Your home looks so cozy and warm, baa~
Even though it's not very big, home is where
you can wrap your arms around the whole world, baa-daa!
info: 闲聊-NPC对附近建筑的反馈-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
I can tell this is your home just from walking here, baa~
Even simple decorating choices can show someone's style,
Just like your usual fashion preferences, baa-daa~
info: 闲聊-NPC对附近建筑的反馈-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
Your tent has such a cozy camping vibe, baa~
Do you sit outside your tent to watch the night sky sometimes?

content:
I really love the wooden flooring at the Camp, baa~
It's such an earthy color...
Coming and going here so many times, it always makes me feel safe and cozy~
info: 闲聊-NPC对附近建筑的反馈-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
I want to give this to Momo,
He's the most knowledgeable storyteller I've ever met, baa~
info: 闲聊-NPC对附近建筑的反馈-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
Whenever I pass by the Omni-Gallery, my steps naturally slow down baa~
I wouldn't want to disturb the time guardians displayed inside, you see...
That's what you'd call reverence, isn't it baa~?

content:
Momo said he put his heart and soul into bringing back a tiny world bubble
to create our Omni-Gallery,
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, do you think our Omni-Gallery might float away someday, baa~?
